pr_title: Issue/3274 filter report list by type

timeline.message: [#3274]Fix empty parameter check. Remove unused stuff.

timeline.bodyText: Why don't we just pass empty string and then check for empty in the method that uses it?
timeline.author: valllllll2000

replies.bodyText: Just for consistency. In most places we pass null to the dao methods to indicate a param should be ignored.
replies.author: stellanl
